channel.title: A weird dude told me this
channel.description:
This man, while I was talking to him about programming and computer stuff, told me you could put linux into a phone.. Into an iPod... into a PS2/3... anything...
Is this true?[br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 06:49:03 PM[/size][hr]BTW, I am installing SUSE over windows right now, then when I get my ubuntu CD's, i'll install that. Anything I need to know before deleting windows and installing linux succesfully?

item.title: A weird dude told me this
item.dc:creator: @aaa801 aaa801
item.description:
@aaa801 wrote:

u still need 2 bypass the ps2 loader

Read full topic

item.title: A weird dude told me this
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

You don’t need any of that. Just run a streamlined version in RAM.

Read full topic

item.title: A weird dude told me this
item.dc:creator: @aaa801 aaa801
item.description:
@aaa801 wrote:

i know u can run linux on a ps2
but u need a
hard drive
a keybord
mouse
eathernet addapter 4 downloading modules
and a boot up disk
i think u can buy it 4 about £500

Read full topic

item.title: A weird dude told me this
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath_96, post:7, topic:40508”]You could probably put linux into a mouse, although it would probably die.
Phone - yes, TV - yes.[/quote]

So I guess he was right…

Read full topic

item.title: A weird dude told me this
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“juju, post:5, topic:40508”][quote author=uber killer link=topic=56769.msg701783#msg701783 date=1167371649]
This man, while I was talking to him about programming and computer stuff, told me you could put linux into a phone… Into an iPod… into a PS2/3… anything…

Is this true?
[/quote]
Yes.
Ipod: http://ipodlinux.org/Main_Page
PS3: http://www.yellowdoglinux.com/[/quote]

How about a phone? A mouse? A TV? :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.source: A weird dude told me this

item.title: A weird dude told me this
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“uber killer, post:3, topic:40508”]Nvm… I guess I don’t need to delete windows, and it works perfect, but I need to get the internet working, lol… Connects to the router, router is connected to the internet, but wont load any pages from the internet… Help?

Anyway, back to the question… Is it possible to put linux on a phone/printer, whatever?[/quote]
Does your network use static (internal) IP’s, or DHCP?

If the computers on your network each have a static IP, you have to set your ISP’s DNS server (ask them what it is).

Read full topic
item.source: A weird dude told me this

item.title: A weird dude told me this
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Nvm… I guess I don’t need to delete windows, and it works perfect, but I need to get the internet working, lol… Connects to the router, router is connected to the internet, but wont load any pages from the internet… Help?

Anyway, back to the question… Is it possible to put linux on a phone/printer, whatever?

Read full topic
